short_summary: Vyopta Maintenance and Support Contract for FY 24-25.
description: Vyopta Maintenance contract, amendment 000, is a long-term maintenance service for the Maintenance and Support of Vyopta. This is a sole sourcesservice that the Contracting Entity has determined is not a consumable item, and any and all requirements for the Contracting Entity have been determined through successive evaluations by the Contracting Entity. Services will be provided for both Hardware (HW) and Software (SW) components, for a period of at least 5 years. More information about the contract terms may be obtained from the "Attachments" section of this notice.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement: Contract for Vyopta Maintenance – FY 24-25

#### Solicitation Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM021028/25884
*   **Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, March 14, 2024, 15:00:00
*   **Publication Date:** Friday, February 29, 2024
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Dimeji Temidire
    *   Phone: 613-618-2048
    *   Fax: 999-999-9999
    *   Address: Minto Building, Ottawa

#### Contract Overview

The government of Canada invites tender submissions for the Vyopta Maintenance – FY 24-25 contract.

This contract will cover the maintenance and support of Vyopta, a network and system management tool used by Shared Services Canada.

Key Information:

*   **Contract Value:** To be determined
*   **Contract Duration:** FY 24-25
*   **Maintenance Scope:** Includes corrective and preventative maintenance, technical support, and repair or replacement of equipment.

The contractor is expected to provide maintenance personnel, technical expertise, and equipment to ensure the optimal operation of Vyopta.

**Procurement Method**

*   **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open bidding

**Geographic Scope**

*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

**Notice Documents**

To access the notice documents and tendering information, visit the links below:

*   https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/BF6C0498-DD95-4614-A0F9-A3248752951F
*   https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/4BD51F9F-BBA1-4FD7-AD4A-098CBA9B9D56
*   https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/39048210-9542-4BC0-B540-828046BBA559

The government of Canada encourages all qualified contractors to submit their tender submissions before the deadline.

This notice is for your discretion only.
